name: Connected Worlds (MIGA Gamez)
description:
This game is just a fun platfomer game made for a game jam.

In this game there are two worlds of cubois(cube-boi) are connected to each other. Using both worlds help the cubois to reach the destination to become one.

It is made in one and half day so i didn't have much time for many levels, so this game only have four demo levels. But new levels will be added soon to the game.

Enjoy and support ....

Challenge:

Can you beat my best time?? 

Send screenshot of your best time in the comments 

Instructions :

When you switch between worlds the tile on which the cubois of same color( like red on red tile) doesn't affect by the change.  So with the help of that try to reach the destination.
